channel.title: Mejin's Open Table
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Mejin's Open Table

item.title: Cadabear
item.description: Cadabears are a relatively recently discovered form of undead. The cadabear is more than an undead bear, it is heartier overall and relies on smell and sound rather than sight.

item.title: Vulpine Marker
item.description: Overview A socketable item with 1 charge. A subtle section of a vulpine inkling that it used when tracking its prey. When this item is socketed into a magic item it can spend its charge to cast Hunters Mark as a bonus action.

item.title: Vulpine Inkling
item.description: Vulpine inklings appear as a fox made out of living ink and able to manipulate their form with between that of a puddle and that of a fox. While they do hunt for food, they often hide from creatures larger than themselves, but will fight if cornered.

item.title: Sudsee
item.description: Overview A notable lake bound fishing and farming village, Sudsee has a lot of trade with Bergstadt. The town itself houses a simple community with a single tavern, an elected mayor, and only enough spears to arm those capable of fighting.

item.title: Kleihafen
item.description: Overview Known for the Temple of the Five, Kleihafen is a popular pilgrimage spot. The town is also a major port, so goods and people regularly arrive.

item.title: Shafedorf
item.description: Overview A herding town that has been growing as of late, which has led to good stone being a scarce resource, and often trades with Flusstadt to get its hands on some ...

item.title: Dimal Barport
item.description: Dimal was an apprentice wizard at the Zweiflus Grand Library. After he had been studying there for some time, Dimal made off with thousands of gold worth of books on magic, killing 5 people in his escape.

item.title: Ostwald
item.description: Overview A lumber town in the southern Ausfallen region, Ostwald is known for its high quality wood working, its festivals, and its colorful people. Ostwalds population is largely Beast-Folk, and the city celebrates its fey origins with riddle championships, a culture of flower arrangements, and a tradition of story telling.

item.title: Sudhafen
item.description: Overview A vibrant port city, Sudhafen has a colorful market with trade from all over the coast, travel to distant islands, and many rare goods. Run by a committee elected by the people, Sudhafen is a safe town.

item.title: Mauerinhugeln
item.description: Overview Beginning its life as a castle built to house and train the fledgling Watchmen, Mauerinhugeln gathered tradesmen to itself to support its growth ...
